location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lord Minto [Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound], Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor General of Bengal that William Bruce has granted two sets of exchange for payment of the part subsidy to Persia for 1810, as per the instructions of Sir Harford Jones [Brydges].
